if (currentList) { // remove all members within group HR VIP Watchlist from watch list var groupMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
groupMembers.addQuery('group.name', 'HR VIP Watchlist'); groupMembers.query();
if(groupMembers.hasNext()) gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('Non-VIP employee. Members of the VIP watch list group have been removed from the watch list.'));
